p: As another EO, the toxin inhibition potential of Ocimum species EO has been reported for aflatoxin B 1 [ 111] and fumonisin [ 110]. Moreover, promising levels of antifungal activity were reported against Aspergillus flavus, Aspergillus fumigatus, Aspergillus terreus, Alternaria alternata, Penicillium italicum, Fusarium nivale, and Cladosporium spp. [ 111, 112].
